game.name: Incinera: Pandemonium
game.shortDescription: This is a romance game that combines narrative puzzles with visual novels. Five love stories, five eras, a journey of soul. In endless reincarnation, you will witness the transformation of the world as the god of marriage, and when the story reaches its end, you will be forced to be part of it...
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a romance game that combines narrative puzzles with visual novels. Five love stories, five eras, a journey of soul. In endless reincarnation, you will witness the transformation of the world as the god of marriage, and when the story reaches its end, you will be forced to be part of it...
